name: Mike
description:
I’m a honest man,loyal, open minded,fun to be with, out going, enjoy life, have a get up and go kind of mind, passionate, very loving, have loads of love to give, positive in all things, I like music blues of all kinds walking, soft romantic music, meals in and out door, walking on sandy beaches. If you would like to know more interesting stuff about me please get in contact and I will answer any questions you ask.I have nothing to hide.
I’m looking for a woman who will be a part of my life. an intelligent, warm, kind, friendly, compassionate and look doesn’t matter.a woman that is an extremely sensitive.a woman in my life and look forward to meeting some nice one.
